Document with Tables

This document contains various tables to test the conversion service's ability to handle tabular data when converting between PDF and DOCX formats.

Simple Table

A basic table with header row and regular data:

Name Age Occupation Location
John Smith 32 Software Engineer New York
Jane Doe 28 Data Scientist San Francisco
Robert Johnson 45 Project Manager Chicago
Emily Williams 31 UX Designer Seattle

Data Table with Formatting

This table contains various data types and formatting:

Product Price ($) In Stock Rating Description
Laptop Pro 1,299.99 Yes ★★★★★ High-performance laptop with 16GB RAM and SSD
Smartphone X 899.50 Limited ★★★★☆ Latest smartphone with advanced camera system
Wireless Headphones 199.99 Yes ★★★★☆ Noise-cancelling wireless headphones with long battery life
Tablet Mini 499.00 No ★★★☆☆ Compact tablet with 10-inch display

Schedule Table

A table representing a weekly schedule:

Time Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday
9:00 - 10:30 Team Meeting Client Call Development Planning Development
10:45 - 12:15 Development Development Design Review Development Team Meeting
13:00 - 14:30 Design Meeting Development Client Demo Development Project Review
14:45 - 16:15 Development Testing Development Client Call Retrospective
16:30 - 17:30 Testing Documentation Testing Documentation Planning

This document tests the ability of the conversion service to handle various types of tables with different complexity levels.
